name: H.O.L.E.S.
description: Welcome in the year 10... after the 7,000th  iteration of artificial intelligence inventing artificial intelligence. May I present to you H.O.L.E.S. (Horribly Overengineered Launchable Extermination Singularities) where you as a prototype bot developed by M.I.P.T.Y. Engineering (May I present to you) suddenly develop consciousness and need to find a way from earth to escape the earthian population. Have fun
